title: Magic Damage Numbers Dont Show up
body:
Title explains everything, whenever I deal magic damage, the damage applies but simply does not show.
A better way to put this together is when I use an ability that does magic damage ( say Udyr's R or Ryze's Q ) the numbers wont show up 
all other damage types do show except magic damage ( including true damage ) I've been experiencing this ever since I started playing on my smurf.
Any help would be appreciated!

replies.body:
I was just able to test this myself, and it does seem like having Damage Numbers turned on still shows magic damage from Ryze's Q for me at least. I'd maybe try a quick repair, and if that doesn't help I'm curious if a config reset might help since it kind of sounds like it's only happening on your smurf? If it's only on your smurf, try resetting your config files with these steps...

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
